title: Improvement Strategies and Applications of the Brain Storm Optimization Algorithm

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of optimization algorithms and clustering techniques
context.additional_context: Students participate in hands-on activities and visual analysis using personal devices, learning both theoretical approaches and real-world applications for complex function optimization problems

learning_goals: The exploration and exploitation mechanisms of the BSO algorithm can be analyzed and explained
An algorithm improvement framework using an Orthogonal Design (OD) engine can be designed and implemented
The performance of the proposed algorithm can be quantitatively evaluated by applying it to complex optimization problems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
